BaySpec documentation
=====================

*BaySpec* is a Bayesian inference-based spectral fitting tool for multi-dimensional and multi-wavelength astrophysical data.


Contents
^^^^^^^^

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   installation.rst
   tutorials.rst
   modules.rst
